name: Rainbow Standoff
description:
Rainbow Standoff is one of those games that is visually striking as well as unadulterated fun time. A revisit to a staple - the Arcade genre, two player, begin as friends and end up enemies. In Rainbow Standoff we combine good old Pong with the hardships of Breakout. Face your best friend, you mother, the upstairs neighbor, But remember the first one to score five goals - Wins!

Two Player - Two Pedals - Two Balls, What am I describing, well, Rainbow Standoff

To win, you have to score on you opponent and be careful, don't embarrass  your self by missing your ball, it will only help your adversary. you have only 5 points, the first to lose them all, well, loses. 



the game was developed during a turbulent game jam session No. 1 as a part of a collaboration between Bezalel Academy of Design and Arts and the Hebrew University. 

It's the beautiful brainchild of four students, nay, friends, Noga, Shlomi, Netzer and Mayo.
